resources.name: Afro Vegan Society
resources.content: Afro-Vegan Society is a Baltimore based national nonprofit organization with a mission to provide resources and support to help people in marginalized communities transition to vegan living.

resources.name: Poplar Spring Animal Sanctuary
resources.content: Poplar Spring Animal Sanctuary is a 400 acre non-profit refuge in Poolesville, Maryland for farm animals and wildlife.

resources.name: Black Vegan Society
resources.content: The Black Veg Societyâ€™s mission is to educate the public, particularly BIPOC communities, on the benefits of veganism and the plant-based diet.

resources.name: Earthsave Baltimore
resources.content: Earthsave Baltimore is a local non profit dedicated to promoting all aspects of veganism. It hosts potlucks, restaurant get togethers and speaking events.

resources.name: Vegetarian Resource Group
resources.content: Vegetarian Resource Group is a non profit dedicated to educating the public about the benefits of a vegan lifestyle.

resources.name: Maryland Vegan Families
resources.content: Maryland Vegan Families is a Facebook group dedicated to supporting and providing resources to vegan families living in Maryland.

resources.name: Afro Vegan Society
resources.content: Baltimore Vegans is a Facebook group dedicated to encouraging veganism and supporting vegans in Baltimore.

resources.name: Barnard Medical Center
resources.content: Barnard Medical Center is a 100% vegan medical center dedicated to helping people improve their health.
